    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceRepresentation

        public DeviceRepresentation(java.lang.String representedDeviceName,
                            ConnectionOptions connectionOptions,
                            java.lang.String broker,
                            java.lang.String topic)
        Creates a new DeviceRepresentation.
        Parameters:
        representedDeviceName - The name of the represented device.
        connectionOptions - The options that define the connection between the client and the broker.
        broker - The broker over which status updates of the device a sent.
        topic - The topic to which status updates of the device are sent.

    • Method Detail

      • addCallback

        public java.lang.String addCallback(java.lang.String topic,
                                    IMqttReceiver receiver)
        Set the callback that should be executed if a message has been received under the subscribed topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic that should be listened to.
        receiver - An implementation of the IMqttReceiver object which will be called when a message has been received.

      • disableCallback

        public java.lang.String disableCallback(java.lang.String topic)
        Disables the callback for the specified topic. The callback can be enabled again by the enableCallback function.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic who the callback that should be disabled is listening to
        Returns:
        Success or failure of disabling the client.

      • enableCallback

        public java.lang.String enableCallback(java.lang.String topic)
        Enable the callback for the specified topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic who the callback that should be enabled was listening to.
        Returns:
        Success or failure of enabling the client.

      • removeCallback

        public java.lang.String removeCallback(java.lang.String topic)
        Permanently removes the callback.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic who the callback that should be removed is listening to
        Returns:
        Success or failure of removing the client.

      • registerMessage

        public void registerMessage(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String topic,
                            java.lang.String value)
        Register a new message to be sent over the sendMessage method. registering a message does not send the message.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the message which will be used to send the message with the sendMessage method.
        topic - The topic for which the message is intended. this is not restricted by the topic given for the constructor.
        value - The value that will be sent to the topic upon sending the message.

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(java.lang.String name)
        Send a registered message.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the registered message that should be sent.
        Returns:
        The result of the sending of the message.

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(java.lang.String name,
                                    int qos,
                                    boolean retained)
        Send a registered message.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the registered message that should be sent.
        qos - The quality of service for the message that should be used. 0 for lowest and 2 for highest. 2 guarantees delivery if the broker is available but costs more resources. 1 guarantees delivery but can create more network traffic. 0 does not guarantee delivery.
        retained - If retained is true the sent message will be retained by the topic. All new Subscribers will get this message even if they weren't subscribed at the time of delivery.
        Returns:
        The result of the sending of the message.

      • getDeviceValue

        public java.lang.String getDeviceValue(java.lang.String key)
        Get the newest message that was provided under a given topic.
        Parameters:
        key - The topic under which the message was sent.
        Returns:
        The newest message of the given topic.

      • closeClient

        public java.lang.String closeClient()
        Close the client of the HomeyDeviceRepresentation.
        Returns:
        The result of closing the client.
